attributes.action: make Oleg Luzhny king or at least some sort of overlord with a special hat.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Oleg is a top bloke and has lovely teeth.
Luzhny captained the Ukraine national side a record 39 times and achieved immense personal recognition in his country. In December 2000 he was voted into the Ukrainian 'Team of the Century' according to a poll by The Ukrainsky Futbol weekly. Thats similar to a Darlington fan saying you're alright.
Do the right thing Mr President.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
